metadata.title: CVE-2017-6010 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in icoutils 0.31.1. A buffer overflow was observedin the "extract_icons" function in the "extract.c" source file. This issuecan be triggered by processing a corrupted ico file and will result in anicotool crash.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6010` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

icoutils - 0.31.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: icoutils package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.31.2-1').
